bill.title: Medical radiation technologists; extend repealers on registration statutes and add limited x-ray machine operators.
bill.description: An Act To Amend Section 41-58-1, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Revise Certain Definitions And Define The Term "limited X-ray Machine Operator" For The Purposes Of The Statutes Providing For The Registration Of Medical Radiation Technologists; To Amend Section 41-58-3, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Revise The Membership Of The Medical Radiation Advisory Council; To Increase The Amount Of The Registration Fee For Medical Radiation Technologists And Provide For A Biennial Registration; To Revise The List Of Persons Who Are Exempt From Registration; To Amend Section 41-58-5, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Prescribe The Education And Continuing Education Requirements For Limited X-ray Machine Operators; To Revise Certain Continuing Education Requirements For Persons Exempt From Registration; To Increase The Amount Of The Fee That The Board Of Chiropractic Examiners And The State Board Of Medical Licensure May Charge For Certification Of Completion Of Continuing Education Requirements; To Extend The Date Of The Repealers On Those Three Code Sections; And For Related Purposes.

step.action: Referred To Public Health and Human Services
Referred To Public Health and Welfare
